title.narrative: NATIONAL CAPACITY FOR VIOLENCE PREVENTION AND RESPONSE

description.narrative: Increased country capacity to promote and ensure justice that enables the prevention and treatment of violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect, which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Justice For Children, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, National legislation is implemented to prevent, mitigate and address violence and other childhood abuses and the justice, education, public health, security and other sectors observe children's rights to this protection.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased country capacity to promote and ensure justice that enables the prevention and treatment of violence, abuse,exploitation and neglect

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the establishment of a national child helpline assisting 800 children with counselling and referral services. Continued support to the roll out of the National Child Diversion Programme, diverted 381 children in conflict with the law from formal court adjudication to community-based support. Furthermore, Child Protection Policies were created for nine entities in four inner-city communities with the aim to be used as good practice models for communities island wide. ;An Action Plan for Juvenile Correctional System Reform was developed with the Ministry of National Security; follow-up actions are underway to develop related SOPs and deliver training; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:25/01/2022
